. China can help ease imbalances by raising the value of its currency, Olivier Blanchard said. The U.S. and other countries charge that China keeps its currency artificially low to maintain an export advantage. China is moving in the right direction and focusing increasingly on domestic demand, but we think it can be done faster, he said. Former Secretary of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama . ''He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure,'' Colin Powell said on NBC's ''Meet the Press.'' Obama Girl displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself. had no legal claim to it. The SCA, which Zahi Hawass heads, said in an email that its request had been approved by both Prime Minister Ahmed Nazif and the Egyptian ministry of culture. This request is a natural consequence of Egypt's long-standing policy of seeking the restitution of all archaeological and historical artefacts that have been taken illicitly out of the country, it said. Zahi Hawass has campaigned to repatriate several pharaonic treasures in recent years, including the Rosetta Stone now in the British Museum. Article: Egypt asks Berlin to return Nefertiti bust...
